website_summaries.verdict: This beautifully crafted daybed has become a longstanding favorite, thanks to its durable construction and versatile design. Excellent quality that is built to last a lifetime.
pros: Solid wood construction is strong and sturdy
Classic style can be dressed up or down to suit a variety of interiors and lends itself well to customization
Roll-out trundle drawer can be used to hold an extra mattress or as a storage solution
Available in a warm honey maple or airy white finish
cons: Heavy and difficult to move once assembled

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed, but it is not white, it is ivory.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this daybed. It was so easy to assemble, but definitely a 2 person job. I am just a little disappointed that it is not as white as I thought it would be. It is more ivory colored, so it is a little bit different than the other pieces of furniture that I got for my son's nursery that are actually white. A XL Twin size mattress for the top bed and a Twin size mattress for the trundle were a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!  Well made Daybed.  Use twin extra long mattress on top.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful unit. Easy to assemble. Everything fit perfectly. Can't say enough about the customer service. Due to the shipping date, I had to change the delivery address and they were able to do that efficiently for me. I recommend an extra long twin mattress for the top. It fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Lady

customer_reviews.title: I love the bed
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed, easy to put together and great construction. However, it is not white. It's cream with a yellow hue. This must be a re enter color change because it came with white pieces that I'm going to have to spray paint or contact the comp naughty about. Pretty disappointed. Really needed white to go with the crib. Mailing it back is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: John-Michael Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Ivory color, NOT WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bed, came a day before delivery ETA. However, The color as shown on the picture and item description states white, in reality we received a very off white, ivory color that does not match our white furniture. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle c.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grandkids room to accommodate our growing family. The grandkids love being able to share a room but not a bed. We're older, retired folk but had no issues putting it together. The trundle rolls easily but it would have been nice to have a "guide" to help it return to the right place...my only issue. We did get an extra long mattress for the top but a regular for the bottom. It looks great and seems well made. If the grandkids are happy, I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: gaj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: First thing you notice is how well packed the parts are in the three boxes that arrive. Reinforced box corners and plenty of styrofoam. Assembly went very well as everything lined up as required and all hardware was included. In the end you have a heavy, high quality day bed that is superior to many higher priced beds. I bought two of the same foam topped mattresses but I will be returning one as it is too tall for the trundle piece. My fault, I should have measured before I headed out to buy them. Overall, very pleased with the bed and if you're in the hunt, I do recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Lenexa

customer_reviews.title: Fits twin XL on top
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made bed that was easy to put together. We use a 10” twin XL mattress on the top so our 6’ son can sleep comfortably when he visits. For the trundle we have an 8” twin mattress. Be aware that the white color is actually ivory. This wasn’t and issue for us as we read the reviews before buying and we wanted ivory. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ATL mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for the Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. This is by far the lest expensive place to buy it. The local furniture stores were selling this bed for as much as $1,000. It's really easy to put together. The matrices for this bed do not come with the bed. You have to buy one extra long mattrice and one regular one
customer_reviews.author: Sascha496

customer_reviews.title: Casey Daybed with Trundle
customer_reviews.text: This is a guest bed so we don't use it everyday, but it is very convenient as a day bed with room for two. I like the length that allows for a long twin on top and a regular twin below. It looks really nice in our extra room. And the price was very agreeable compared to other products. Of course, I had to buy two mattresses so it's a little more expensive for those who don't really need two beds. It works for us and we enjoy the design and finish.
customer_reviews.author: DDS

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together within a short amount of time
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived within the estimated delivery time. The color was darker than in the picture; more Maple stain than Honey stain. I did have someone else put the frame together for me. The instructions were clear, easy to put together within a short amount of time. All of the pieces and holes matched up perfectly. The frame very solid and stable; no "wobbling". The slats that hold the mattress in place has alternate places for screws to keep slats in place. The particle board for the trundle thick and strong. Even though I measured the seating height in real time a little higher than imagined but I like it. A very nice looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this bed! It was easy to put together and is very sturdy and attractive. We bought a plush 12 inch twin extra long mattress for the top and a nice 8 inch memory foam mattress for the bottom. We could not be more pleased and have enjoyed using it for our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Nola in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is not white but cream white. It is a very sturdy and well made daybed/trundle. The manufacturer had the parts to put together the best I have seen so this is a top quality piece of furniture. The top bed takes a twin xl mattress and the bottom takes a twin. We bought a 7 inch mattress for the bottom and an 8 inch for the top. Great fit for both beds. High recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: c&scolli

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed!!! It arrived very fast. Came in 3 large boxes. Was very easy to assemble & it is very sturdy. We purchased a twin XL memory foam mattress for the top & a regular twin for the trundle after reading other reviews. They fit perfectly. Would recommend this daybed to anyone. Very happy with our purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but definitely not white
customer_reviews.text: This bed is really pretty and seems quite sturdy. The assembly was not easy but really just time consuming. The instructions are very good. The only gripe is that the finish is quite a bit yellower than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: it truly is a great bed! Second time I received all 3 boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I only received the trundle box and had to return it and order the bed again, it truly is a great bed! Second time I received all 3 boxes and was easy to put together. It took little over an hour. It is more of a linen color.
customer_reviews.author: kelson harris

customer_reviews.title: The bed took less than 15 minutes to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed with trundle for a great price as compared to the exact same item offered by LL Bean. I put the bed together by myself and it took me less than 15 minutes to assemble. The trundle took a little longer - about a half hour. I purchased the Twin-XL Dreamfoam Bedding Ultimate Dreams Crazy Quilt Pillow Top Mattress from Amazon for the bed. I've had two visitors already and no complaints. I did not purchase a mattress for the trundle (yet) but it would take a regular twin mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Meade

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for a toddler. We purchased this bed for my 23-month-old. After reading reviews, we did go with an extra long mattress which fits perfectly. Bed was easy to put together, seems to be very high-quality, and looks great. So far my daughter has enjoyed sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Aggiebeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed! It is perfect for our office/den. We originally got it for grand-kids but it is a very big bed and adult guests sleep perfectly on it. I ordered a 12 inch extra long memory foam twin for the top and a regular twin 8 inch memory foam for the bottom. Both fit perfect. The bed is very well made and sturdy. I cannot speak to the assembly as my husband and a handy friend assembled but it only took an hour with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed, customer service was great, but the wood DOES have a smell and it's fading, but still there. If we go away for the day and leave the house closed up, it's stronger. I'm hoping, since it's been fading, that it will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. It is sturdy, easy to put together and best of all gorgeous! I can't believe the price. This would cost double at the local furniture store. It was delivered in three large boxes to my door. It took just over one hour to put together. It has a beautiful finish and is a very nice white, not to bright and not yellowish either. Like a winter white. So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch attention to quality!
customer_reviews.text: The Casey II wood daybed came exactly as picture. It has a top quality finish and appearance. The instructions are clear and the assembly pieces are minimized through great engineering, and the shipping packaging was super. I would definately buy again. It appears to be very durable. I recommend it to all now I’ve touched every piece.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Keck

customer_reviews.title: The bed looks fantastic btw!
customer_reviews.text: Bed arrived today 5 days after I placed the order however it is missing the trundel bed! I hired a contractor to build it and he's done building the bed but with the missing trundel I have to pay him for another day to get him to come back. It's intended for a guest bed and the guest is coming this weekend! Please send the trundel asap!! Thanks and I'll update the review. The bed looks fantastic btw! Here’s the update: the rest of the bed case in the afternoon and was put up the same day. It’s of high quality and is extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lea King

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious! I read reviews looked at pictures to gauge the color and although some pictures looked truely white what I recieved is cream colored. Exactly what I was avoiding in my other options. Other than that the material is solid and very nice design. If you are looking for something that is WHITE do not risk buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed!!! I bought this for my daughters room and I was super nervous about purchasing online without seeing it first. However I could not be more impressed. It look amarzone and the quality is very nice. The bed does fit a XL twin mattress and a regular twin for the trundle
customer_reviews.author: ccicora

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for what we needed & well made
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful for the reviews that told me to get a Twin XL for the top bed, and a regular twin for the bottom bed. We put this in a small room for when grandkids visit. It is perfect for what we needed & well made!
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts and NOT WHITE. Beautiful bed but does not match the other bedroom furniture due to the cream color, very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Raegen S.

customer_reviews.title: Its not cheap but very, very, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this day bed is extremely well made. Very simple design but all solid wood and brass screws and wood screws. One person can easily put this together and the directions are very straight forward and simple. I am really impressed with the quality. One as mentioned in many of the other reviews is to buy and extra long twin size mattress for the top day bed and the trundle takes a standard sized twin. I went 8 inches in the thickness of the mattress on both top and bottom. Not cheap but well made. thanks sam.
customer_reviews.author: Sam2Lucky13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trundle bed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trundle bed. Very sturdy. One box came with a definite score on it but the wood was it damaged. It goes through more than one carrier to get to your place so can't say when it happened. I love the bed. It takes our twin extra long mattress. Love the color. Very classy bed. Trundle part is very well made and rolls well with the 8 rollers. Was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this daybed
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this daybed. It is indeed well built. The only reason I am leaving 3 stars is because of the color that was advertised. It's actually an ivory color instead of a bright white. It did not match the rest of the furniture in my nursery. Instead of going through the hassle of returning the bed, I decided I'd just go ahead and paint it instead. Again, happy with the way that it looks and the build, just unhappy that it was color that was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Samra

customer_reviews.title: and I like that she is protected on 3 of the sides
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughters room. She is only 2 1/2 years old, so I was nervous about it being up to high, but she has no problems climbing into it, and I like that she is protected on 3 of the sides. And I have a rail up to protect her from falling. I also like the fact that if she has a friend/cousin over in the future that there is room for them in the trundle bed. It was easy to quick and easy to build. My husband hates doing that type of stuff but we never had a problem with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well-built
customer_reviews.text: This proved to be a very sturdy, well built, easy to assemble unit. After many months of use, my first impression of the overall high quality has held true. Other reviews said that one person couldn't assemble this. Challenge accepted and won. I'm very, very happy with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Craig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item assembled well and is made very well. Heavy and substantial. It looks terrific. A steal at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Anna E. Stonefield

customer_reviews.title: Not true white (it’s off-white)
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed, but I was disappointed in the color. The description said “white”; however, it is off- white. The rest of the furniture I got was true white, so the bed doesn’t match the other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Herron

customer_reviews.title: Bed is nicely constructed, shipping box looked like it was in a war
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new bed, granted that's mostly the mattress' doing, but the bed looks great. The trundle is easy to roll out, it's all easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the box that the bed came in looked like it had fallen off a rack somewhere. I didn't notice that the trundle had actually become impaled within the box. There's 2 2" stab wounds in the bed. I forget they are there, and I'm sure my daughter will do worse as she gets older. But I wish more care had been taken in packaging and shipping this bed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Not White
customer_reviews.text: Construction is solid; easy to assemble; the bed looks nice. As others have said, a Twin XL mattress fits in the top half; the drawer mattress needs to be a regular twin. One problem: the description definitely needs to be changed from white to cream. The color is not even an "antique" white -- it's a yellowy cream. If a true white finish is important to you, this is not the daybed for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bed is very sturdy but it is really false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Bed is very sturdy but it is really false advertisement. Says it is white and picture is white, but it is CREAM COLOR. Disappointed in that because my shelves and trim are WHITE. It is very sturdy and very solid. So much that we didn’t want to mess with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Angle

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if I had received all the Allen screws I needed to put the trundle together. The package was 4 short -- should have had 16. I followed the directions and notified amazon via email last week but have yet to hear back as to whether or not I'll get them. Too bad. The directions were excellent and simple! The bed and trundle were easy to put together, too, and the quality was impressive. I would just appreciate getting everything I need to put it together completely.
customer_reviews.author: Great Lakes Girl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed ...but the color is not white like the picture, is cream color !
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: from the description it sounded like it should be
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very solid and well built, from the description it sounded like it should be, and it met all expectations. It was easy to assemble and is an attractive piece of furniture as well. I would recommend this bed and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed! Arrived early and nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed! Arrived early and nicely packaged. Color is white but not ultra bright white. It does blend with some of bright white furniture. (Candlelight might be a good description?). Bed is solid and looks great. Easily and quickly put together (used a drill) with 2 people. My 10 year old loves it. A standard twin mattress is fine. The trundle is functioning as a drawer now but will hold a mattress easily. Great purchase with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived damaged. Also description says WHITE and it is not white, it is cream---didn't match our white dresser and desk. We had to mail the bed back to amazon because arrived damaged. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very happy with quality  a 10 !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Grand daughter and could not be happier. unit is well made and sturdy the botton has a full bottom that is well supported and could be used for storage as well .. well packaged. no damage and grandma put it together
customer_reviews.author: kscott

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is worth every penny. The finish is amazing, it was well packaged and shipped, and the quality exceeded my expectations. THe trundle is great for storage, or putting a mattress in for sleep overs. We are very happy with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful bed ,it came damaged but Amazon did take money off of the price,or offered a replacement but the spot is not that noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, delivered quickly although box was torn open everything was there, Easy assembly, solid built, looks great! 8 year old grand-son sleeps on it every night!
customer_reviews.author: Beretta

customer_reviews.title: so good with this bed
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with this bed. The bed uses a twin XL mattress (exactly what we were looking for), and the trundle holds a thin twin mattress. It was easy to put together and looks nice. We liked it so much we purchased another one. The price does fluctuate, so bide your time if you can. ,We've had it for about a month without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Essing

customer_reviews.title: Lovely daybed
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed and trundle! Everything was super easy to put together. Only took my mother and I about 1 1/2- 2 hours from unboxing everything to finished product. I just used a Stanley FatMax ratchet hand screw driver and the Alan wrench it came with, nothing fancy. It’s not a bright white as some may think but it is still beautiful. My daughter loves her new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: I love the casey daybed
customer_reviews.text: I love the casey daybed. Good quality..no particle board construction..solid wood. Im a 64 yr old woman and assembled it on my own. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Not in color white
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I a whole afternoon to put this together... we don’t have the power drill which will definitely speed up the process. Unfortunately some parts are damaged. It’s NOT white. It’s a cream color. A bit disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Mayflower

customer_reviews.title: This is a really special Day Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly well made and solid. Very happy with the quality of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hildmat

customer_reviews.title: ... circle covering the screws would have gotten an I LOVE IT vote
customer_reviews.text: the only thing missing was covering up screws on side of bed - not sure what the correct name of the item is but a wood circle covering the screws would have gotten an I LOVE IT vote
customer_reviews.author: Michele Adami

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble.  Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Went together In 15 minutes with just me and my wife and a electric screwdriver. Had the niece and nephew sleeping on it the next day. Was impressed with the solidity of the mattress support layers real wood and a lot of it. This is real furniture, not the partial board stuff you get most places
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a year ago. Excellent piece of furniture. Beautiful wood color, nicer than on pictures. Worth the price. I use the bottom draw for storing clothes, not for additional mattress . The shipment arrives in multiple boxes, make sure you receive all from ups.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made trundle bed
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded our expectations Well made piece of furniture and very attractive, Price was about half of other trundle beds that we looked at online. I highly recommend this trundle bed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be Packed better
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this Bed for the guest room. Putting it together was a snap, and it looks great. Very well built. The only issue is the package. It comes in three very large boxes, two of which looked as if they had been thrown down stairs a few times. And yes, everything in those two boxes were busted to pieces. Amazon was really nice tho, about sending me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGamer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this daybed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this daybed! The quality is good, it was an easy set up, and the picture is an accurate portrayal of the item. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Not completely as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pros: this bed is sturdy and easy to put together. The support slats are woven together and the hardware is simple and easy to identify when building. Cons: Once assembled, the bed actually accommodates a twin xl mattress, not a regular twin. The twin mattress leaves an approximate 6” gap. (Picture shows our bed with twin mattress) Also, This bed is not bright white. It’s more of a cream or off white color that did not match our other furniture. Overall: We decided to purchase an xl mattresss ( second picture) and keep the bed due to time constraints and associated hassle with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Emminger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Pottery Barn Style Bed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is difficult to find a day bed nowadays doesn't look like something a clown would sleep in. This is very sturdy/well built and basically looks like it came from Pottery Barn. Took me and another guy about 30 mins to set up-half that time was taking it out of the boxes. Also nice, was the fact that UPS delivered it, not some ghetto delivery company. I am also 6'4 and have slept very comfortably in it.
customer_reviews.author: JJR jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the princess
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this daybed for our grandaughter. She loved it and picked it out for herself. We had never purchased anything so large and were concerned about the condition and quality of the daybed. Also, we were not sure how anything that large would arrive at our house. Not to worry. The bed itself was of great quality, and was in good condition. The packing was fantastic. Each of 4 large boxes were very well packed with quality packing materials. There was not a scratch on it, no mars, and no damages. We were so pleased. We would not hesitate to buy this way again.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. High quality. Absolutely no complaints whatsoever. It does need a twin XL on top and a twin in the trundle. Comes in three large boxes, ours arrived over two days, so we had to wait briefly to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Bed was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bed was easy to put together. Love that it's solid wood. The only reason I gave a 4 star is it's not white. It's off white which doesn't match my other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Debra White

customer_reviews.title: Study daybed!
customer_reviews.text: Very study and looks just like the picture. No problems assembling...just took time.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great quality, easy to assembly and a great addition for kids room to grow as teens
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago and never rated it but it gives me the chance to say how durable it is, took it apart and moved it went back together easily. Would definitely recommend to others!!
customer_reviews.author: andrew deckel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of furniture. It's stable unlike most daybeds. I'm 60 years old and assembly took about 90 minutes. The hardest part was the weight of the pieces. It looks more expensive than it is. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Great spare bed,
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Now it did take 3 hours to assemble, 2 older adults! Directions were easy to follow, but you need 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and stylish bed. The honey maple color is rich and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Grim

customer_reviews.title: Not white at all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for my two daughters. We just set it up and it's clearly not white. It's an off white, cream, aged color. Almost looks sundamaged. It's a nice bed otherwise but I am very disappointed in the color. The other photos looked white.
customer_reviews.author: cmp

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bed but I do want to clarify for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bed but I do want to clarify for people that this detail will make a difference with their purchase; the color is totally off-white and not true white like the pictures. This is disappointing for me as I wanted bright white to match the baby furniture in the room. We've assembled it and it's staying but the off-white color is driving me a bit nuts as it doesn't match with the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Well made beautiful trundle bed. Bed was packaged very well! No scratches or marks.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Great Daybed!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture...looks great and is solid. I looked at a lot of options both in store and online...this was clearly the best value. Assembles easily and goes quickly if you use a power screwdriver of some sort. Delivered in three boxes which are fairly heavy...and were fairly torn up on arrival (fortunately, no damaged pieces).
customer_reviews.author: statguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish. I chose to add additional strength by ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and designed. Nice finish. I chose to add additional strength by gorilla glueing the planks, although not required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lovely and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, a lovely bed, and a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: love the bed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a day bed for months now and kept coming back to this one then it went on sale. And there was free finaceing so i said why not. It is beautiful. Very well made the trundle slides in and out with ease. So very easy to put together. My son and i had it together within an hour. I also bought the mattress and quilt set from Amazon. I have not slept on the bed yet but my daughter said it was the best night sleep she had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece of furniture. The honey color is beautiful. The whole bed is made of solid wood. Assembly was easy and the instructions were clear. Very impressed with the packaging as there was not one mark from shipping damage.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loves it. Fit perfectly. Heavy and comfortable and easy to asemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the bed?
customer_reviews.text: Where’s the rest of the bed? Only the trundle arrived. And, the bed isn’t white but cream!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together and looks so nice in my spare room
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Just like it looks in the picture. Easy to assemble, all the right parts were there, the holes lined up perfectly (unusual in my experience of self-assembly). Good, solid construction. The trundle does not pull out all that easily on carpet which is fine if you don't pull it out very often. I imagine it would be much easier on hardwood or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Teen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great! Use an xl matteess fits perfect. Our son is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bed has an strong odor. It's been almost 2 months.. It is fading slowly... But I wonder what paint was used and if it is safe for kids...
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: comes in really heavy boxes, thus a heavy bed. but pretty
customer_reviews.author: MariViews

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: All descriptions were accurate, including color shown on picture. Trundle rolls amazingly well. After agonizing over whether to purchase twin mattress for the daybed (recommended by manufacturer) or XL twin recommended by many users, I bought a twin. I went in to two furniture stores looking for mattresses and both recommended a twin so that I would have room to easily make up bedding.
customer_reviews.author: stillhouse1

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bed. Got two of them for two of my daughters. Very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, solid wood, easy instructions
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this daybed! Good quality, solid wood, easy instructions. Works perfectly in our guest room. As others have said, this is sized for an extra long twin mattress and sits up high off the floor. Not appropriate as a transition bed for a toddler. We haven't purchased another mattress for the trundle but are currently using it for additional linens, pillows, blankets and towels - an everything an overnight guest may require - storage.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Quality solid furniture
customer_reviews.text: True quality we love it! Bought for our guest office and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Great daybed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this daybed for my guestroom. Took me about 45 minutes to build with a little help from the gf. THe bed is very well made and is very sturdy. My dad came to visit and said its very nice. I purchased an XL memory foam mattress and it fits perfectly. Will eventually purchase another for the trundle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The trundle bed is perfect for when our grandchildren come to visit! I was a bit spectacle about having to assemble this ourselves....but the directions were perfectly easy to follow and the assembly was flawless! This trundle bed fits beautifully in our spare room!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to put together. All parts were there and I had it together in under an hour. The only hard part was getting it into my house - it came in three boxes and they were heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Dowanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. We purchased this bed about a year ago. I pulled the bottom bed out a hand full of times and the front of it just ripped off on one side. It’s upsetting seeing as how we very rarely pulled the bottom bed out. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful bed.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful. My husband and I put it together in under an hour. Definitely a two person job. Easy instructions to follow. Highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne M. Rutyna

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great with setting up the exchange
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole through the box and foot board. Amazon was great with setting up the exchange. The one with the hole was picked up from my house the next day and a new bed arrived by the end of the week. The new bed is perfect! Exactly what I was looking for. I love the size of this daybed. Looks great in my newly renovated room!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Coursey

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, looks beautiful and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Trundle
customer_reviews.text: Suprised trundle drawer is so free flowing under the bed. It is not attached to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful antique white daybed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful antique white daybed! No problem with delivery. Was packed nicely so no damage. Easily put together!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the bed
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the bed. It does seem very sturdy, fairly easy to put together. My one and only complaint is this, IT IS NOT WHITE. It is a yellowish white color. It doesn't match the white dresser I have in her room. I would have exchanged it, but had already taken down my daughter's crib and removed it from the house. The price point was also very good, so I kept it, even though it doesn't match :(
customer_reviews.author: S. Philip

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy. I needed a handi-man to put it together
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. I needed a handi-man to put it together. My grandkids wont be able to tear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gill

customer_reviews.title: Not bright white
customer_reviews.text: Daybed is off white and not bright white. It also took about 2 1/2 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, quality piece of furniture. It was packed well also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together very sturdy and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: crystal

product_meta.title: Casey II Wood Daybed with Ball Finials and Roll Out Trundle Drawer, Honey Maple Finish, Twin
product_meta.description:
Color:Honey MapleLike a blank canvas ready for the artist’s touch, the Casey daybed is the perfect base from which to build a room. Coated with a Honey Maple finish and easily adaptable to a number of styles, this daybed can go from country casual to sleepover central. Sturdy, wood construction in the back and arms makes this bed both practical and beautiful. The roll out trundle drawer can accommodate a twin sized mattress for a sleepover guest or be used as extra storage. The Casey comes complete with a support surface so a link spring is not needed. This unit includes a back and side panels, wood deck slats, roll-out trundle, instruction sheet, and hardware bag with everything needed for easy assembly. The Leggett & Platt Casey Daybed comes with a 10-year limited warranty against manufacturing defects. Leggett & Platt Inc. is an industry leader in the production of adjustable bases, fashionable beds, bedding support, and top of bed textiles. By keeping a close eye on the design community and other fashion and decorating sources, Leggett & Platt stays on top of the trends and knows the right mix of finishes, innovative designs, and technology to continually provide quality crafted products at an exceptional value. Leggett & Platt Consumer Products: Value Without Compromise

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Prop 65 Warning: This product can expose you to chemicals including titanium dioxide (airborne, unbound particles of respirable size), which are known to the State of California to cause cancer or birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
feature_bullets: Twin sized daybed constructed of wood with Honey Maple finish
Perfect base from which to build a room
Includes a roll-out trundle bed and wood slat deck for mattress support (mattress not included)
Protected with a 10-year limited warranty against manufacturing defects
